ValidationRule.description: AVP cannot enter Manager Forecast on Rosa Opportunity page is Surgeon Name field is left blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKm', RecordType.Id =='012C0000000YQqa', RecordType.Id =='0123b000000IKKr' ), OR( $User.Id = '005C0000009kZnW', $User.Id = '005C000000Bo6lq', $User.Id = '0053b00000BIdLd'
), OR( ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"High"), ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"Gut"), ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"Low"), ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"Out"), ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"IN"), ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"Up"), ISPICKVAL(Manager_Forecast_Judgement__c,"Won") ), NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won") ), ISBLANK(Surgeon_Name__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide the Surgeon Name details
